title: Bug 118487Report iTem tempalte value should provide the option to revert.
EB: Bug 118487Report iTem tempalte value should provide the option to revert. The Report Tempalte spec mockups expect the following.UI needs to support the following 2 options as described in the Report Template spec mockups.
SR: Revert to Template Item ( call DE APIDesignElementHandle.revertToTemplateItem ) Revert to Report Item (call DE API DesignElementHandle.reveretToReportItem or TransformToReportItem() ) to create a report item and get rid of the template definition )
